dc:title: The Prayer of Jesus
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Summarizes The Way of a Pilgrim and the Jesus prayer. Quotes the book and recommends it as a spiritual classic. Underscores its application in daily living.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 883 1954-01-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
